name: CloudStor.it
tag_list: cloud, storage, cloudstor-it, amazon, aws, s3
overview:
CloudStor.it offers cloud storage at 1/7th the cost of Amazon S3. Our pricing is $50 per terra-byte, per month; which includes two (2) terra-bytes of data transfer bandwidth per month.

CloudStor.it seamlessly integrates with any Amazon Web Services Application or service. And, we integrate with any other “Cloud” providers such as RightScale, RackSpace, Eucalyptus, Cloud.com, Heroku, VMWare, etc. with similar savings.

CloudStor.it also offers storage server appliances for $100 per TB, a fraction the cost of storage offered by: Dell, Hp, IBM, NetApp, or EMC. Our “plug and play” NAS appliances, are managed from your web browser, and support: FTP, SMB/CIFS, AFS, NFS, GFS, PVFS, SHFS, Gluster and KosmosFS.

CloudStor.it also offers storage and compute clusters for unlimited storage and computational power.

Visit our website for more information: http://CloudStor.it
